python:
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time
from event_manager import *
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed
import music

event_manager.reset()

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_v_v_S_d_c():
  global chuoi, nhietdo, doamkhongkhi, anhsang, doamdat
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  nhietdo = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  doamkhongkhi = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  anhsang = round(translate((pin0.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  doamdat = round(translate((pin0.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  mqtt.publish('testDADN', (''.join([str(x) for x in ['!', 'temp:', nhietdo, ';', 'doamdat:', doamdat, ';', 'doamkhongkhi:', doamkhongkhi, ';', 'light:', anhsang, '#']])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_v_v_S_d_c)

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin14.pin, 4)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__Canhbao_(chuoi):
  global nhietdo, doamkhongkhi, anhsang, doamdat
  if chuoi == '!5:1#':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
  if chuoi == '!5:0#':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
  if chuoi == '!6:1#':
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if chuoi == '!6:0#':
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if chuoi == '!7:1#':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if chuoi == '!7:0#':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def _C4_90_C4_83ng_k_C3_BD_server():
  global chuoi, nhietdo, doamkhongkhi, anhsang, doamdat, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb
  mqtt.on_receive_message('Canhbao', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__Canhbao_)

def sound_alarm():
  for count in range(5):
    music.play(['A5:1'], wait=True)
    music.play(['E5:1'], wait=True)

def on_event_timer_callback_V_Y_L_M_A():
  global chuoi, nhietdo, doamkhongkhi, anhsang, doamdat
  if (round(translate((pin0.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))) <= 30:
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  else:
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if (aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()) >= 40:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  elif (aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()) >= 50:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(100, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if ('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])) == 17:
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(50, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  elif ('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])) == 18:
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if pin2.read_digital()==0:
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(100, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    sound_alarm()

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_V_Y_L_M_A)

if True:
  display.scroll('Hello!')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('', '')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='io.adafruit.com', port=1883, username='thonghuynhthanh', password='aio_fuaC55KGa7zgLYReO4Cqn3XzJzRa')
  ntptime.settime()
  (year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour, minute, second, milisecond) = RTC().datetime()
  RTC().init((year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour+7, minute, second, milisecond))
  _C4_90_C4_83ng_k_C3_BD_server()
  display.scroll('OK!')

while True:
  mqtt.check_message()
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
